name: Paper Airplane Flyer
description:
This game was an experiment in using easing functions and tilt controls to capture the feeling of flying a paper aircraft. It does have scoring, lives, and a lose condition, but was mostly coded to wrap my head around some concepts and prepare for an eventual fleshing-out of the core mechanics into a more fully realized game.

If you want to play it, you'll have to sideload it onto your phone. This may change in the future. I mostly am uploading it to itch.io for 1GAM.
